com.rohanclan.cfml.editors.contentassist
Interface IAssistState

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAssistTagAttributeState, IAssistTagState
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultAssistAttributeState, DefaultAssistState, DefaultAssistTagState
public interface IAssistState

AssistInfo is filled by the CFE-core. The core content assistors will determine cursor position, trigger chars, etc. They use it internally and then provide it to any assist contributors.

Method Summary

          Gets the data from the last delimiter to the current document position.

Method Detail

getIDocument

public org.eclipse.jface.text.IDocument getIDocument()
Gets the document that the user is working upon. Clients can test & cast for CFML docs if they wish.

getOffset

public int getOffset()
Gets the offset within the document that the assist is being triggered at

getTriggerData

public char getTriggerData()
Gets the character that caused the trigger. In some cases this may be Ctrl+Space.

getDataSoFar

public java.lang.String getDataSoFar()
Gets the data from the last delimiter to the current document position.

getPreviousDelimiterPosition

public int getPreviousDelimiterPosition()
Gets the position in the document where the last delimiter is.

getOffsetPartition

public org.eclipse.jface.text.ITypedRegion getOffsetPartition()
Gets the info about the partition that the offset exists within.

Returns:
The ITypedRegion representing the partition. This may be null if not set.

getITextView

public org.eclipse.jface.text.ITextViewer getITextView()
All content assist is associated with a text viewer. This method returns the text viewer that this content assist has been called upon.

Returns:
The text viewer associated with the content assist.
